Rattrap " hey dad. you got any idea why the comms don't work. You remeber BlackArachnia, Optimus Primal and Rhinox don't you? When should the three of the meet Rodimus?"

Polar Claw <cycodrone@...> wrote:OOC: For the sake of keeping things linear, I think we
should play this as if it happened before the whole
Kitkat thing While Shadowcaster is still cloaked while
talking to Cheetor. Shadowcaster had known that some
parts of coming back from the Matrix would be
emtional, but he hadn't counted on how special it
would feel to be with his son Rattrap again. It had
been a hard road for them when he'd revealed himself
to during the Beast Wars, with Rattrap initially
blaming him for abaondoning him to grow up on the
streets after several failed Cybertronian Orphanages,
but the two had made their peace after Shadowcaster
had had his epiphany with the Matrix. They had just
really developed a strong father son bond when the
Nemesis attacked and Shadowcaster was forced to make
the ultimate sacrifice for everyone, including his
son. He could still remember his last words spoken
before he rammed into it on a direct line to Rattrap
"Forgive me".

Shadowcaster quietly approached Rattrap from behind,
gently laid a hand on him and decloaked. "I'm right
behind you son." he answered beamingly.

--- Tankor <lordofdarkness11001@...> wrote: >
Rattrap " Cheetor great to see you again."
>  
> Rhinox " Cheetor when the hell did you get here"
>  
> Ba " Hey KittyCat"
>  
> Optimus " hey cheetor have you seen any sign of
> Silverbolt."
>  
> Rattrap " Hey cheetor do you know where ShadowCaster
> went?"
> 
> 
> OMWOS <o_mighty_wife_of_shinigami@...> wrote:
> OOC: Well then... since Tankor missed my post about
> Cheetor trying to 
> talk to the other Maximals, I'll do a repost, but it
> may not work since 
> I have no idea where everyones at now.
> ~~~
> 
> Cheetor's famous grin returned, "Hey, you can't have
> all the fun now." 
> He was excited, to see an old face back from the
> Matrix. He was 
> beginging to think he was the only one that made it
> out processing when 
> a familar squeky type voice floated to his ears. His
> mouth dropped open 
> as he turned. That was it, he had gone insane, he
> was imaging things, 
> hearing his own crews voices. His mind was still in
> a whirl after what 
> Shadowcaster had told them.
> 
> "Rattrap? Rhinox?! BlackArachnia?!? Is it really you
> guys?" His eyes 
> widened. "B...Big Bot?," he whispers as if he's
> afraid Optimus will 
> dissaper before him.
> 
> OMWOS
> 
> 
> 
>
